languages.text: {n}Флейтист загадочно улыбается и прикладывает к губам мундштук. Простая задорная мелодия льется из инструмента, и угрюмые лица прохожих и торговцев становятся немного мягче, а туннели уже не кажутся настолько убогими. Даже когда мелодия затихает, многие продолжают насвистывать ненавязчивый мотив себе под нос.{/n}

{n}The flute player smiles mysteriously and brings the flute to his lips. A simple, brisk melody pours out of the instrument, the glum faces of workers and traders soften a little, and the tunnels around you seem less squalid than before. Long after the music has stopped, many continue to whistle the unassuming ditty.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Флейтист загадочно улыбается и прикладывает к губам мундштук. Простая задорная мелодия льется из инструмента, и угрюмые лица прохожих и торговцев становятся немного мягче, а туннели уже не кажутся настолько убогими. Даже когда мелодия затихает, многие продолжают насвистывать ненавязчивый мотив себе под нос.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un sourire mystérieux aux lèvres, le joueur de flûte porte l'instrument à sa bouche et entame une mélodie simple, mais rythmée. Progressivement, les visages jusque-là moroses des ouvriers et des marchands s'adoucissent, et les tunnels qui vous entourent vous semblent moins sordides. Beaucoup continuent de siffler la chansonnette longtemps après la fin de la musique.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The flute player smiles mysteriously and brings the flute to his lips. A simple, brisk melody pours out of the instrument, the glum faces of workers and traders soften a little, and the tunnels around you seem less squalid than before. Long after the music has stopped, many continue to whistle the unassuming ditty.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un sourire mystérieux aux lèvres, le joueur de flûte porte l'instrument à sa bouche et entame une mélodie simple, mais rythmée. Progressivement, les visages jusque-là moroses des ouvriers et des marchands s'adoucissent, et les tunnels qui vous entourent vous semblent moins sordides. Beaucoup continuent de siffler la chansonnette longtemps après la fin de la musique.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El flautista esboza una sonrisa enigmática y se lleva la flauta a los labios. Una sencilla y alegre melodía brota del instrumento, los rostros ensombrecidos de los trabajadores y comerciantes se relajan un poco, y el ambiente se te antoja un tanto menos miserable que antes. Aun después de que la música haya cesado, muchos continúan silbando la modesta cancioncilla.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The flute player smiles mysteriously and brings the flute to his lips. A simple, brisk melody pours out of the instrument, the glum faces of workers and traders soften a little, and the tunnels around you seem less squalid than before. Long after the music has stopped, many continue to whistle the unassuming ditty.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El flautista esboza una sonrisa enigmática y se lleva la flauta a los labios. Una sencilla y alegre melodía brota del instrumento, los rostros ensombrecidos de los trabajadores y comerciantes se relajan un poco, y el ambiente se te antoja un tanto menos miserable que antes. Aun después de que la música haya cesado, muchos continúan silbando la modesta cancioncilla.{/n}

languages.text: {n}フルート吹きが謎めいた笑みを浮かべて、フルートを口に運ぶ。シンプルで爽やかなメロディが楽器から流れ出すと、労働者や商人たちの暗い表情が少し和らいで、周囲のトンネルが先ほどより少し明るくなった。音楽が鳴り止んだ後も、多くの人がその素朴な音色を口笛で吹いている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The flute player smiles mysteriously and brings the flute to his lips. A simple, brisk melody pours out of the instrument, the glum faces of workers and traders soften a little, and the tunnels around you seem less squalid than before. Long after the music has stopped, many continue to whistle the unassuming ditty.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}フルート吹きが謎めいた笑みを浮かべて、フルートを口に運ぶ。シンプルで爽やかなメロディが楽器から流れ出すと、労働者や商人たちの暗い表情が少し和らいで、周囲のトンネルが先ほどより少し明るくなった。音楽が鳴り止んだ後も、多くの人がその素朴な音色を口笛で吹いている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}吹笛人神秘地微笑着，将笛子放在嘴边，一段简单轻快的旋律从笛子中飘了出来。工人和商人阴郁的面孔似乎变得柔和了一些，周围的隧道看起来似乎也没那么肮脏了。笛声停止之后，很多人依然吹着口哨，演奏着这支不知名的小曲，口哨声持续了很久。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The flute player smiles mysteriously and brings the flute to his lips. A simple, brisk melody pours out of the instrument, the glum faces of workers and traders soften a little, and the tunnels around you seem less squalid than before. Long after the music has stopped, many continue to whistle the unassuming ditty.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}吹笛人神秘地微笑着，将笛子放在嘴边，一段简单轻快的旋律从笛子中飘了出来。工人和商人阴郁的面孔似乎变得柔和了一些，周围的隧道看起来似乎也没那么肮脏了。笛声停止之后，很多人依然吹着口哨，演奏着这支不知名的小曲，口哨声持续了很久。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Flötenspieler lächelt geheimnisvoll und setzt die Flöte an seine Lippen. Eine einfache, klare Melodie erklingt aus dem Instrument, die trübsinnigen Gesichter der Arbeiter und Händler entspannen sich ein wenig, und die Tunnel um dich herum wirken weniger ärmlich als zuvor. Noch lange nach dem Ende der Musik, pfeifen viele das harmlose Liedchen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The flute player smiles mysteriously and brings the flute to his lips. A simple, brisk melody pours out of the instrument, the glum faces of workers and traders soften a little, and the tunnels around you seem less squalid than before. Long after the music has stopped, many continue to whistle the unassuming ditty.{/n}

Noch lange nach dem Ende der Musik, pfeifen viele das harmlose Liedchen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Flütçü, gizemli bir şekilde gülümseyerek flütü dudaklarına götürüyor. Enstrümandan basit ve canlı bir melodi yayılıyor. İşçilerin ve tacirlerin asık suratları bir nebze yumuşuyor. Etrafını saran tüneller ise eskiye kıyasla gözüne daha az sefil geliyor. Müziğin sona ermesinden uzun bir süre sonra bile pek çoğu, ezgiyi ıslıklarıyla sessiz sedasız devam ettiriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The flute player smiles mysteriously and brings the flute to his lips. A simple, brisk melody pours out of the instrument, the glum faces of workers and traders soften a little, and the tunnels around you seem less squalid than before. Long after the music has stopped, many continue to whistle the unassuming ditty.{/n}
